attributes.action: Remove Maria Millar from Government office.
attributes.additional_details:
As Maria Miller is a public servant and I am a member of the public, I am requesting that due to Mrs Millars, recent information, that she claimed £90,718 from the public purse between 2005 and 2009 for mortgage payments and bills on a home in Wimbledon, south west London, the payments went to a second home that her parents had lived in since 1996
IF this had been a person stealing benefit money they would have been arrested, placed before a court of law and receive a custodial sentence.
Mrs Millars apology to, only, the M.P.s IS her ADMISSION of GUILT.
Remove from office........UNSUITABLE to serve,
I request that the FULL amount of £90,718 be returned to the public purse, out of the £1.5 PROFIT made on the sale of the house in Wimbledon. instead of the measley £5,800 expenses imposed.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter and not a matter for Government
